meanings.definition: Organisms with multiple sets of chromosomes derived from the same species.
meanings.sent1: Autopolyploids are plants with extra sets of chromosomes.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study autopolyploids to understand genetic variations.
meanings.sent3: The autopolyploids at the botanical garden seem to be having a chromosome party!
meanings.sent4: In the world of genetics, autopolyploids are like having a full deck of cards and then some.
meanings.sent5: The farmer marveled at the autopolyploids, each plant bursting with genetic potential.

meanings.definition: An individual or species that has more than two complete sets of chromosomes.
meanings.sent1: Autopolyploids can exhibit unique traits due to their extra chromosomes.
meanings.sent2: The autopolyploids in the lab are thriving under controlled conditions.
meanings.sent3: At the genetic conference, the autopolyploids stole the show with their extra chromosome flair.
meanings.sent4: The autopolyploids in the field stand out like stars in a sky full of genetic diversity.
meanings.sent5: The zoo proudly displayed the autopolyploids, a marvel of nature's chromosome abundance.

meanings.definition: The state or condition of having multiple sets of chromosomes from the same species.
meanings.sent1: Understanding autopolyploids helps in exploring genetic diversity within a species.
meanings.sent2: Autopolyploids can arise through natural genetic processes.
meanings.sent3: The autopolyploids in the genetics lab were throwing a chromosome party!
meanings.sent4: In the world of genetics, autopolyploids are like having a full deck of cards and then some.
meanings.sent5: The autopolyploids in the botanical garden showcased the beauty of genetic variation.
